Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGConfigurationChangeService
    since 6.6.0. CPS component will directly invoke MG APIs.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.exception.MGRuntimeException
    since 6.6
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.exception.MGSDKException
    since SDK 6.6.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.activateCard(String, PaymentType, PaymentServiceListener, CardActivationListener)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.addService(String, BusinessService)
    since 6.6 - no operation
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm.WalletPinManager.askWalletPinForLVT(boolean)
    this API is deprecated since 6.5.0. To enforce WalletPIN LVT payment with authentication, refer to CustomConfiguration.Builder to enforce authentication for LVT transaction.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.experience.PaymentExperienceSettings.checkPaymentExperienceSupport(Context, PaymentExperience)
    6.7.0 it is no longer advised for usage. With performance improvements done, MPA could adopt to PaymentExperience.ONE_TAP_ENABLED directly.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.experience.PaymentExperienceSettings.checkPaymentExperienceSupport(Context, PaymentExperience, int)
    6.7.0 it is no longer advised for usage. With performance improvements done, MPA could adopt to PaymentExperience.ONE_TAP_ENABLED directly.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.cdcvm.DeviceCVMVerifier.confirmCredential(CharSequence, CharSequence)
    6.4.0, please use DeviceCVMVerifier.startAuthentication(DeviceCVMVerifierInput) instead.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.forceAddService(String, BusinessService)
    since 6.6 - no operation
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.generateQRCodePaymentData(String, PaymentServiceListener)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.getAuthenticationFlowPriorToPayment(PaymentServiceListener, PaymentType)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentSettings.getDisableDeactivationOnPosDisconnect()
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.getService(String)
    since 6.6 - Service object can be obtained from different BusinessManager class
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm.WalletPinManager.isAskWalletPinForLVT()
    this API is deprecated since 6.5.0. To enforce WalletPIN LVT payment with authentication, refer to CustomConfiguration.Builder to enforce authentication for LVT transaction.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MobileGatewayManager.resetSDKStorage(Context, MGConfigurationResetListener)
    since 6.6, it is not recommended to call this API alone. To avoid de-synchronization of walletId, it is recommended to call wipe from @com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.sdkconfig.SDKDataController#wipeAll(Context)) which also helps to wipe MG.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentSettings.setDisableDeactivationOnPosDisconnect(boolean)
